title: Contributing to the gsm Universe
text: Thank interest contributing gsm suite packages! repository follows centralized gsm Contributor Guidelines maintained gsm.core. Please review guidelines opening issues submitting pull requests.

title: Contributing to the gsm Universe
text: File issue opening pull request. Use appropriate issue template. Track issue gsm Roadmap Project Board. code changes made branch submitted PR following guidelines linked . detailed workflows (branching, releases, QC, CI/CD), please see full Contributor Guidelines gsm.core.

code: @Manual{,   title = {gsm.datasim: Synthetic Test Data Generator},   author = {Roman Rogoza and Laura Maxwell and Zelos Zhu},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 1.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/Gilead-BioStats/gsm.datasim}, }

title: Synthetic Test Data Generator
text: gsm.datasim package provides functionality produce sample data use testing development applications packages related Risk-Based Quality Monitoring (RBQM) Clinical Trials. Given inputs regarding synthetic Study’s desired ID, Participant Count, Site Count, Snapshot Count, Key Risk Indicators constructed, package generates data pertaining : Participant demographics Adverse effects Trial discontinuation Lab results Visit information Study site location /E criteria Study metadata Default, package constructs data create KRIs available {gsm} package.

what: Installation *Temporarily broken due to repo permissions issue*
title: Synthetic Test Data Generator
text: can install development version gsm.datasim GitHub :

title: Synthetic Test Data Generator
text: See inst/examples/run_gsm_workflows.R script run gsm workflows using data generated raw_data_generator. Result analysis reporting data along html report outputs.
code: # Generate raw data using specified parameters  data <- raw_data_generator(ParticipantCount = 100, SiteCount = 10, StudyID = "Study01", SnapshotCount = 5)   # Generate raw data using specified parameters and Mappings  data <- raw_data_generator(ParticipantCount = 100,                             SiteCount = 10,                             StudyID = "Study01",                             SnapshotCount = 5,                             workflow_path = "workflow/1_mappings",                             mappings = c("Raw_STUDY", "Raw_SITE", "Raw_SUBJ", "Raw_ENROLL",)   # Generate raw data using a template file (currently it runs on a smaller template but not always on a larger one),  # this is our current goto sim process:  data <- raw_data_generator(template_path = "~/gsm.datasim/data-raw/small_template.csv")

what: Generate Snapshots for Single Study Data — generate_rawdata_for_single_study
title: Generate Snapshots for Single Study Data — generate_rawdata_for_single_study
text: function generates list study data snapshots based provided specifications, including participant count, site count, study ID, number snapshots generated. data simulated series months, key variables subject enrollment, adverse events, time study populated according study's specifications.

title: Generate Snapshots for Single Study Data — generate_rawdata_for_single_study
code: generate_rawdata_for_single_study(   SnapshotCount,   SnapshotWidth,   ParticipantCount,   SiteCount,   StudyID,   workflow_path,   mappings,   package,   desired_specs = NULL )

title: Generate Snapshots for Single Study Data — generate_rawdata_for_single_study
text: SnapshotCount integer specifying number snapshots generate. SnapshotWidth character specifying frequency snapshots, defaults "months". Accepts "days", "weeks", "months" "years". User can also place number unit "3 months". ParticipantCount integer specifying number participants study. SiteCount integer specifying number sites study. StudyID string specifying study identifier. workflow_path string specifying path workflow mappings. mappings string specifying names workflows run. package string specifying package workflows used MakeWorkflowList() located. desired_specs list specifications data types included.

title: Generate Snapshots for Single Study Data — generate_rawdata_for_single_study
text: list data snapshots, element contains simulated data particular snapshot period (typically month), variables populated according provided specifications.

title: Generate Snapshots for Single Study Data — generate_rawdata_for_single_study
text: function generates snapshots sequence months, starting "2012-01-01". snapshot: number adverse events (ae_num) simulated. number participants screened determined. Key variables (subject ID, enrollment date, time study, etc.) populated data type specified combined_specs.

title: Generate Snapshots for Single Study Data — generate_rawdata_for_single_study
code: snapshots <- generate_rawdata_for_single_study(   SnapshotCount = 3,   SnapshotWidth = "months",   ParticipantCount = 50,   SiteCount = 5,   StudyID = "ABC",   workflow_path = what: gsm.datasim: Synthetic Test Data Generator — gsm.datasim-package
title: gsm.datasim: Synthetic Test Data Generator — gsm.datasim-package
text: Generates synthetic test data RBQM Clinical Trials based several parameters.

title: gsm.datasim: Synthetic Test Data Generator — gsm.datasim-package
text: Maintainer: Roman Rogoza roman.rogoza@atorusresearch.com Authors: Laura Maxwell laura.maxwell@atorusresearch.com Zelos Zhu zelos.zhu@atorusresearch.com contributors: Gilead Sciences [copyright holder]

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: See magrittr::%>% details.

what: Generate Raw Data for Study Snapshots — raw_data_generator
title: Generate Raw Data for Study Snapshots — raw_data_generator
text: function generates raw data study snapshots based provided participant count, site count, study ID, snapshot count. parameters NULL, loads template CSV file iterate multiple study configurations. generated raw data saved RDS file.

title: Generate Raw Data for Study Snapshots — raw_data_generator
code: raw_data_generator(   ParticipantCount = NULL,   SiteCount = NULL,   StudyID = NULL,   SnapshotCount = NULL,   SnapshotWidth = NULL,   template_path = system.file("template.csv", package = "gsm.datasim"),   workflow_path = "workflow/1_mappings",   generate_reports = FALSE,   mappings = NULL,   package = "gsm.mapping",   save = FALSE )

title: Generate Raw Data for Study Snapshots — raw_data_generator
text: ParticipantCount integer specifying number participants study. NULL, function use values template file. SiteCount integer specifying number sites study. NULL, function use values template file. StudyID string specifying study identifier. NULL, function use values template file. SnapshotCount integer specifying number snapshots study. NULL, function use values template file. SnapshotWidth character specifying frequency snapshots, defaults "months". Accepts "days", "weeks", "months" "years". User can also place number unit "3 months". template_path string specifying path template CSV file. Default "~/gsm.datasim/inst/template.csv". workflow_path string specifying path workflow mappings. Default "workflow/1_mappings". generate_reports boolean, specifying whether produce reports upon execution. Default FALSE. mappings string specifying names workflows run. package string specifying package workflows used MakeWorkflowList() located. Default "gsm". save boolean, specifying whether saved RDS

title: Generate Raw Data for Study Snapshots — raw_data_generator
text: list raw data generated study snapshot, saved RDS file "data-raw/raw_data.RDS".

title: Generate Raw Data for Study Snapshots — raw_data_generator
text: function performs following steps: ParticipantCount, SiteCount, StudyID, SnapshotCount NULL, function reads template.csv file get necessary parameters multiple studies. generates raw data study snapshots based either provided parameters template file. generated data saved RDS file returned list.

title: Generate Raw Data for Study Snapshots — raw_data_generator
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Generate raw data using specified parameters data <- raw_data_generator(ParticipantCount = 100, SiteCount = 10, StudyID = "Study01", SnapshotCount = 5, SnapshotWidth = "months")   # Generate raw data using a template file data <- raw_data_generator() } # }

title: gsm.datasim v1.1.1
text: release adds new contributor guidelines standardized issue templates.

title: gsm.datasim v1.1.0
text: New Mapping Workflows Support: - Additional workflow support “IE” domain - dates/timestamp support many domains now available.

title: gsm.datasim v1.0.0
text: excited announce first major release gsm.datasim package, collection functions generate synthetic test data RBQM Clinical Trials based several parameters.

title: gsm.datasim v1.0.0
text: User-facing functions - generate_rawdata_for_single_study() can create snapshot(s) single study provided proper parameters appropriate mapping specifications. - raw_data_generator() wrapper run generate_rawdata_for_single_study() create multiple studies providing template/dataset containing variety parameters. New Mapping Workflows Support: - workflows exist gsm.mapping’s inst/workflow/1_mappings now supported, “STUDY”, “SUBJ”, “SITE” “ENROLL” always required. - many gsm.endpoints specific domains, Anticancer OverallResponse now support well. Replacing clindata gsm.datasim: - object gsm.core::lSource created using gsm.datasim examples, tests, vignettes across gsm ecosystem. object based “core mappings” include: “AE”, “COUNTRY”, “DATACHG”, “DATAENT”, “ENROLL”, “LB”, “PD”, “PK”, “QUERY”, “STUDY”, “STUDCOMP”, “SDRGCOMP”, “SITE”, “SUBJ”
